Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Marina Way, just north of Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive is directly to the south of here. On the east, you can see the Regalia Convent, a large estate dedicated to the blasphemous monotheistic philosophy. The only reason it even exists in Oceancrest is because a wealthy resident wanted more diversity in the area of religion and dedicated this building for its study. There are large oak doors on the east which lead into the Convent.
